text: <@U3DHKV84C|yuryandreev> has joined the channel
Hi, where can I find roadmap fabric-sdk-java project? on the current moment it isn’t work well
Can somebody make deploy using “fabric-sdk-java” without error?
<@U3J48LFUG|kfioktistov> has joined the channel

<@U1Y2R5C9L> <@U0YQK8WSV>  Hi last I heard you're working on the V1 proposal for the ChainTest .   I didn't see any movement in this area and helped out by updating the transaction part that Altaf merged last night.  Not 100% sure I cherry picked it right from the working code I had -- but it had to be better than what was currently commited.

So can we get an update ?   Can you submit a WIP gerrit changset so we can see where your at ?
I also don't see any signing up of the JIRAs for this work 

<https://jira.hyperledger.org/secure/RapidBoard.jspa?rapidView=101&view=planning>

Thanks
<@U1Y2R5C9L>  FYI The COP update to the WIP_fabric_v1  changed using now a Json body.  This conforms with the latest COP implementation.
<@U17CZFXGU|plucena> has joined the channel
Thanks <@U2Q0HP4HY>  I'll pull the latest cop. And yes about the v1.0 proposal, I hope to commit something in a day or two.
<@U1Y2R5C9L|maltaf> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/maltaf/F3R36M129/Chaincode_deploy_using_CLI.txt|Chaincode deploy using CLI>

text: <@U2Q0HP4HY> , <@U13TWBRBL> , <@U0YQK8WSV> <@U0YNFB22X> I am having trouble deploying and executing chaincode, so I tried using CLI and it shows the same behaviour.  Please see the above CLI output. It look like deploy i successful, but when we invoke it, we get error "transaction not found mycc/**TEST_CHAINID**"
Can you please help me if I am doing anything wrong?

<@U1Y2R5C9L>, I am able to do cli deploy, but unable to invoke afterwards, it complains `Error: Error endorsing invoke: rpc error: code = 2 desc = failed to obtain cds for mycc2 - Error executing chaincode: Transaction returned with failure: transaction not found mycc2/**TEST_CHAINID**`
But I do not see the docker container running, seems wierd.
And no activity in the orderer after the deploy transaction.
So I am inclined to think that the deploy is not really successful
Same for me <@U0YNFB22X> if you see the above output, there is no error in deploy, but same error in invoke
would you be able to debug that? may be it is a setup issue or something. I pulled the latest peer and orderer this morning
I am trying to get it working, I will post it here if I am successful
Sure, thanks

<@U2Q0HP4HY> I have submitted a WIP changeset. This code successfully submits a signed proposal and receives SUCCESS from peer, submits a transaction and receives UNDEFINED status without any error message. When we invoke/query, we get error saying that the transaction not found <ccid>/<chainid> . It is the same error that we are getting from CLI (I posted above).

Satheesh is looking into the above CLI error. If he (or anyone else) finds a solution, please let me know
